comments.body:
Thanks for the report - that was my fault.

I've added the missing docs - they should be available in around an hour or so once the change has sync'd to our public web servers.

description:
Hello,

The Tomcat 5.5 documentation page : http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-5.5-doc/index.html gives 2 links on the "Apache Tomcat Javadocs" and the "Apache Jasper Javadocs".

However those 2 javadocs are unavailable.
We get the following error message :
"Tomcat's internal javadoc is no longer installed by default. Download and install the "fulldocs" package to get it. You can also access the javadoc online in the Tomcat documentation bundle. "
src : http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-5.5-doc/catalina/docs/api/index.html

This is not the case for the Tomcat 4.1 and 6.0 versions.
summary: The Tomcat & Jasper Javadocs for Tomcat 5.5 are unavailable
